Sentencas: Lanthanum (La) doped Cerium Oxide (CeO2) nanopowder was synthesized at a relatively lower temperature (70 degrees C), without calcination in a simple, faster, and efficient way through sonochemical method.
Titulo: Low-temperature sonochemical synthesis of high dielectric Lanthanum doped Cerium oxide nanopowder

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) results confirmed the formation of a cubic fluorite structure of nanocrystalline CeO2 and lattice deformation due to La-doping in CeO2.
Titulo: Low-temperature sonochemical synthesis of high dielectric Lanthanum doped Cerium oxide nanopowder

Sentencas: TEM analysis revealed that the size of La-doped CeO2 particles is in the range of 20 - 50 nm.
Titulo: Low-temperature sonochemical synthesis of high dielectric Lanthanum doped Cerium oxide nanopowder

Sentencas: In addition, selective area electron diffraction (SAED) and high-resolution TEM (HRTEM) analyses portrayed the nano-crystallinity, lattice fringe pattern, and d-spacing details of La-doped CeO2 powder.
Titulo: Low-temperature sonochemical synthesis of high dielectric Lanthanum doped Cerium oxide nanopowder

Sentencas: Lanthanum doping in CeO2 was further confirmed by a shift in Raman band towards the lower frequency (from 464 cm(-1) to 457 cm(-1)) along with peak intensity increase.
Titulo: Low-temperature sonochemical synthesis of high dielectric Lanthanum doped Cerium oxide nanopowder

Sentencas: Photoluminescence (PL) emission spectra showed that emission intensity of the La-doped CeO2 at 510 nm is increased due to oxygen vacancy mediated charge transfer.
Titulo: Low-temperature sonochemical synthesis of high dielectric Lanthanum doped Cerium oxide nanopowder

Sentencas: All these results confirm the successful doping of La in CeO2.
Titulo: Low-temperature sonochemical synthesis of high dielectric Lanthanum doped Cerium oxide nanopowder

Sentencas: The La-doped CeO2 powder possesses a high dielectric constant (epsilon(r)) of 106 and a low dielectric loss (tan delta) of < 0: 4 % at 1 kHz.
Titulo: Low-temperature sonochemical synthesis of high dielectric Lanthanum doped Cerium oxide nanopowder

Sentencas: The La-doped CeO2 finds potential applications on developing devices in the field of a thin film capacitor, transistors, and solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Low-temperature sonochemical synthesis of high dielectric Lanthanum doped Cerium oxide nanopowder
